error.signature: Error: UPGRADE FAILED: values don't meet the specifications / execution error at template
error.regex: UPGRADE FAILED|INSTALLATION FAILED|execution error at|values don't meet|template.*error|render error

verdict.summary: Helm template rendering or upgrade fails because values.yaml doesn't match the chart's expected schema or templates have errors.

dead_ends.action: Use --force flag to push through the upgrade
dead_ends.why_fails: --force deletes and recreates resources â€” causes downtime and data loss for StatefulSets

dead_ends.action: Delete the Helm release and reinstall
dead_ends.why_fails: Loses release history and may orphan persistent resources

workarounds.action: Use helm template to render locally and inspect the output before applying
workarounds.how: helm template <release> <chart> -f values.yaml --debug to see rendered manifests and errors

workarounds.action: Compare your values.yaml against the chart's default values to find mismatched keys
workarounds.how: helm show values <chart> > defaults.yaml && diff defaults.yaml values.yaml

leads_to.condition: when Helm renders invalid manifests that fail on apply

preceded_by.condition: when migrating between Kustomize and Helm

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Helm values mismatch is about Helm chart template rendering failures, while Kustomize build failure is about Kustomize overlay accumulation errors
